questions.question: Yao Ming was the number one draft pick in the 2002 draft. Who went second overall?

I was born in Melbourne, Australia. I was schooled at Scotch College in Perth. After playing for New Mexico, I was the Timberwolves' first pick in the 1991 draft. I retired after playing in 10 NBA seasons with Minnesota, Chicago, Phoenix, and New York. Who am I?
